message_bd.en:
Just click the link in that email to complete your signup.

If you do not find the email in your Inbox, please check your Spam or Junk folder for an email from NI4OS-Europe Login Notifications  noreply@faai.grnet.gr. If you do find the email in these folders, mark the email as "safe" or "not spam" to ensure that you receive any future notifications about your Internal NI4OS-Europe Login ID.

message_sub.en: You will have 72 hours to verify your account
